name: gitbook-plugin-mermaid-v8
description: Plugin for GitBook 3 which renders Mermaid flow from markdown. Tries to work cross platform (windows/unix)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:book
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/mermaid && cp ./node_modules/mermaid/dist/mermaid.min.js dist/mermaid && cp mermaid.css dist/mermaid
